about_the_game:
Conquerors of Fate

Step into the world of Conquerors of Fate, a turn-based strategy game inspired by the classics, where you command formidable Conquerors, build mighty kingdoms, and engage in epic battles. Whether you're exploring vast lands, collecting powerful artifacts, or casting potent spells, every move shapes your path to victory.

Six Classic-Inspired Factions

Choose from six distinct factions, each with its own unique playstyle, units, and strategies. From the noble Paladins to the mysterious Sorcerers, these factions draw inspiration from classic strategy games, with plans for even more factions to be introduced post-launch.

Talent Trees and Customization

Customize your conquerors through their talent trees, unlocking powerful abilities and enhancing synergies between creatures, skills, and spells. This system allows for diverse strategies and adaptability, ensuring no two games are ever the same.

Dynamic Combat

Engage in thrilling battles on a classic hexagonal battlefield. With over 75 spells at your disposal and more on the way, plus unique creature abilities, each encounter offers a rich tactical experience. Master the battlefield and turn the tide of combat with strategic brilliance.

Free-to-Play, Fair for All

The game is completely free to play, with strictly cosmetic micro-transactions ensuring a level playing field. No pay-to-win mechanics.

Community-Driven Experience

The community is at the heart of Conquerors of Fate. Free-to-play ensures a larger player base, essential for custom maps, engaging PvP battles, and ongoing balance feedback. Your participation helps shape the game into a dynamic and evolving project.

Solo Developer, Big Vision

Conquerors of Fate is the passion project of a solo developer dedicated to delivering a rich and immersive experience. With a strong focus on community, the game will continuously evolve based on player feedback, with ongoing updates and improvements. This ensures a dynamic, live-service experience, inviting players to dive into a world of strategic depth and endless possibilities.

Cross-Platform Play

Conquerors of Fate will be available on PC, Mac, and Linux, ensuring accessibility for a broad audience. Whether you prefer single-player, hot-seat, or online multiplayer, the game caters to all styles of play.

No DRM, Offline Friendly

Distributed through Steam, Conquerors of Fate offers a DRM-free experience with full offline functionality for single-player and hot-seat modes. Enjoy seamless gameplay without the need for constant online connectivity.

Open-Source Contributions

While the game itself will not be open-source, the map editor will be released as an open-source project. Additionally, an open-source combat simulation tool will be available, enabling players to test strategies and contribute to AI development and game balance.

Multilingual Support

At launch, Conquerors of Fate will support English, Russian, and Polish, with potential for additional languages based on community demand.

Embark on a strategic adventure that challenges your mind and rewards your tactical prowess. Conquerors of Fate is more than a game; it's a community-driven journey into the heart of strategy gaming.
